content: AMA 1M65 CPF Retirement Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Nov 2018Practically, what should we be using our CPF for, other than for retirement? Or is this purely saving for when we stop working?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Good Day Every DayLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 30 Nov 2018CPF is a tool for saving and building up our funds when we are young. However, it is a tool for retirement when we are 65 years old. 0 comments0

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019I feel that people need to have a mindset change that CPF is a retirement tool. For me, I think of CPF as a get-rich tool, hence it forms part of my portfolio to get rich and as a baseline for a financial safety net so that it help me to feel more secure and to balance my financial emotions for equity (read: riskier) investments1 comment0
Steph Yeo14 Nov 2018But you'll have to wait until you're old enough to take out money from cpf, so essentially you only enjoy the fruits of your labour when you're older?
